Name: Average resolution time following 'Accepted + Wait - Customer'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' and activity 'Completed + Resolved'

Name: Average time from 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' to 'Completed + In Call'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' and activity 'Completed + In Call'

Name: Total time elapsed for cases involving 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' before reaching 'Completed + Resolved'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' and activity 'Completed + Resolved'

Name: Average delay time due to 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' in the entire incident resolution process
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Accepted + Wait - Customer and the end of the case

Name: Total resolution time of incidents with 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' as a critical step
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Accepted + Wait - Customer and the end of the case

Name: Minimum time from 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' to the next activity in the process
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity Accepted + Wait - Customer and the end of the case

Name: Average time from 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' to 'Completed + Closed' compared to 'Accepted + Wait - Vendor' to 'Completed + Closed'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' and activity 'Completed + Closed'

Name: Total time incidents spend in 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' state across all variants
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Accepted + Wait - Customer and the end of the case

Name: Average time to resolve incidents after 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' compared to after 'Accepted + Wait - User'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Accepted + Wait - Customer and the end of the case

Name: Minimum resolution time of incidents involving 'Accepted + Wait - Customer'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity Accepted + Wait - Customer and the end of the case

Name: Average time between 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' and 'Accepted + In Progress' in the most frequent process variants
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' and activity 'Accepted + In Progress'

Name: Total time from 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' to 'Completed + Resolved' across variants with 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' as a step
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' and activity 'Completed + Resolved'

Name: Elapsed time between 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' and 'Completed + In Call' in cases ending with 'Completed + Closed'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' and activity 'Completed + In Call'

Name: Time from 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' to 'Completed + Resolved' in the variant with the highest performance
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' and activity 'Completed + Resolved'
